thread.title: QB Andrew Luck making throws in practice for Indianapolis
thread.title_full: QB Andrew Luck making throws in practice for Indianapolis

author: MICHAEL MAROT
title: QB Andrew Luck making throws in practice for Indianapolis
text:
Patric Schneider QB Andrew Luck making throws in practice for Indianapolis 
Indianapolis Colts' Andrew Luck watches his teammates warm up before an NFL football game against the Houston Texans, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston. Luck will miss the game with an injury. (AP Photo/Patric Schneider) Patric Schneider QB Andrew Luck making throws in practice for Indianapolis 
Indianapolis Colts' Andrew Luck, left, watches his teammates warm up before an NFL football game against the Houston Texans, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston. Luck will miss the game with an injury. (AP Photo/Patric Schneider) Posted: Wednesday, October 14, 2015 3:34 pm | Updated: 4:01 pm, Wed Oct 14, 2015. 
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Andrew Luck is starting to look and feel like his old self in practice. 
Now he must prove he's just as healthy in a game. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.   Haven’t signed up for All Access yet? Get started here… Screen Name or Email Need an account? Create one now.
